LedgerX. Full-time onsite in NYC. Remote OK for exceptional candidates. https://ledgerx.com

LedgerX is an institutional trading and clearing platform that is awaiting regulatory approval from the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) to trade and clear options on bitcoin. We recently received our temporary registration as a Swap Execution Facility, and are awaiting approval of our application to become a Derivatives Clearing Organization.

Very competitive comp, fast-paced environment and truly interesting, technically challenging work. We're doing some innovative work around putting serious exchange technology in the cloud, bitcoin security, and more.

We're looking for full-stack engineers with experience in our toolset, or ability to learn. We use React.js, Python, C, C++11, ZeroMQ, Docker and AWS. zach@ledgerx.com
